title: Historic Studio Retreat in Ustka’s Port District
description: Discover a unique studio apartment that blends timeless character with modern convenience. With 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, and a cozy 32 sqm layout, this studio features restored historic touches, natural finishes, stacked stone fireplace, and stylish, programmable lighting throughout. Patio doors open to a private terrace, letting you take in fresh breezes and portside atmosphere. Smart use of space and sustainable features, like a rainwater collection system, round out this charming residence.
neighborhood_description: Port District charms with its spirited atmosphere, boasting easy access to boutique shopping and delightful dining options just steps away. The neighborhood’s tranquil, lower-density feel preserves a sense of relaxed living, while proximity to main highways and well-developed bike lines makes getting in and out effortless.
lifestyle_benefits: walkable access to shops and dining
target_buyer: Ideal for young couples or individuals seeking historic ambiance with modern amenities near coastal attractions and town nightlife.
market_positioning: This studio stands out as a rare blend of authentic historic finishes and modern ecological solutions, offering excellent value in Ustka’s port-adjacent market at an accessible price point for stylish coastal living.
